entities.name: luna
entities.description: Luna is a student at Hogwarts who wears an extremely realistic dragon hat. She gives a happy and encouraging message to Ron.

entities.name: ronald
entities.description: Ron is a student at Hogwarts who has been given a task by Luna. He is unable to eat breakfast due to the shock of Luna's hat.

entities.name: slitherin
entities.description: Slytherin is one of the four houses at Hogwarts that Luna wanted to represent with her dragon hat.

entities.name: madam pomfrey
entities.description: Madam Pomfrey is a teacher at Hogwarts who has returned Alicia's eyebrows to normal.

entities.name: angelina
entities.description: Angelina is a student at Hogwarts who comes to Ron and Harry with Katie and Alicia. She wants them to go down to the pitch to check out conditions.

entities.name: katie
entities.description: Katie is a student at Hogwarts who accompanies Angelina and Alicia to Ron and Harry.

entities.name: alicia
entities.description: Alicia is a student at Hogwarts whose eyebrows were returned to normal by Madam Pomfrey. She accompanies Angelina and Katie to Ron and Harry.

relationships.description: Luna wanted her dragon hat to represent Slytherin, one of the four houses at Hogwarts.
Madam Pomfrey restored Alicia's eyebrows to normal.
